meanings.definition: Not causing the destruction of red blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The nonhemolytic solution preserved the red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: The nonhemolytic medication did not harm the red blood cells.
meanings.sent3: The nonhemolytic serum kept the red blood cells safe and sound.
meanings.sent4: Her gentle touch was like a nonhemolytic shield around the red blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The nonhemolytic treatment acted as a protective barrier for the red blood cells.

meanings.definition: Not related to the lysis of red blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The nonhemolytic process did not involve breaking down red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Researchers discovered a nonhemolytic pathway for cell regeneration.
meanings.sent3: The nonhemolytic reaction puzzled the scientists in the lab.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was like a nonhemolytic force in the chaotic experiment.
meanings.sent5: The nonhemolytic approach avoided any harm to the red blood cells during the experiment.
